item.title: LiveCode stacks
item.description: When I converted my site to Jekyll & GitHub, one of the things I left behind was a collection of LiveCode (Revolution) stacks. For many years I was active in the Revolution community before going in other directions and over that time, I built up a small library of stacks that I released into the public domain. LiveCode is a cross-platform rapid development environment. There is an open source community edition available for anyone wishing to get started.
